/** Colors */
/** Font variables */
/** Mixins */
.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block h2 { text-align: center; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block &gt; div { display: flex; justify-content: center; }

@media (max-width: 1199.98px) { .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block &gt; div { grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr; width: 550px; margin: 0 auto; } }

@media (max-width: 575.98px) { .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block &gt; div { display: block; width: 100%; } }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block div.form-item.form-type-item.form-no-label { display: none; }

@media (min-width: 992px) { .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .twitter-tweet-rendered { margin: 1rem; } }

@media (max-width: 767.98px) { .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .twitter-tweet-rendered { width: calc(100vw - 2rem) !important; max-width: 400px !important; margin: 1rem; } }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .twitter-tweet-rendered iframe { width: 100% !important; max-width: 100% !important; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link { margin-top: 3rem; text-align: center; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a { font-family: 'Lato'; font-weight: 400; border-radius: 2rem; border-style: solid; border-width: 1px; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 3rem; text-decoration: none; text-transform: uppercase; letter-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(1rem * .03); background-color: #0071BC; border-color: #0071BC; color: #FFFFFF; display: inline-block; letter-spacing: 2px; padding: 0.5rem 4rem; position: relative; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a:active, .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a .active, .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a .is-active { border-radius: 2rem; }

@media screen and (max-width: 576px) { .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a { letter-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); word-spacing: calc(0.75rem * .03); }
  .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a:not(.subscribe):not(.clear-filters) { width: 100%; } }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a:hover { background-color: #205493; border-color: #205493; color: #FFFFFF; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a:active, .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a .active, .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a .is-active { background-color: #112E51; border-color: #112E51; color: #FFFFFF; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a.disabled { background-color: #D6D7D9; border-color: #D6D7D9; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a:before { display: inline-block; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; text-rendering: auto; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Free'; font-weight: 900; content: '\f099'; font-family: 'Font Awesome 5 Brands'; font-weight: 900; margin-right: 1rem; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .follow-link a span.ext { background: url("/themes/custom/gao/img/ext-link.png") center center no-repeat; display: inline-block; height: 16px; margin-left: 0.5em; width: 18px; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots { bottom: -2rem; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots:focus { outline: 5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots li button:before { display: none; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots li button { border: 0.125rem solid #C2D1D9; border-radius: 0.5rem; height: 0.625rem; opacity: 1; width: 0.625rem; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots li button:focus { outline: 5px auto -webkit-focus-ring-color; }

.block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots li.slick-active button, .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots li button:hover, .block-twitter-api-block.block-twitter-tweets-block .slick-dots li button:focus { background-color: #99CCFF; border: 0.125rem solid #99CCFF; }
